attributes.action: Reduce the speed limits on England and Wales railways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Friday 13th 2008, another death on our railways. This time a teenage girl killed by a 85mph train on a level crossing. How many more deaths do there have to be before something is done? Hopefully this may go some way in persuading the government to reduce the speed that all trains travel to a sensible one. We are all told 'Speed Kills', well in the case of a train doing upwards of 100mph (Eurostar) it most certainly will.
